All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Assignable
Defines the contract for objects that can be assigned to a Driver.
AssignmentPanel
Panel for assigning and releasing drivers to/from vehicles.
BreakeType
Enumerates the brake mechanism types.
BreakingSystem
Represents the braking-system component of a vehicle.
Bus
Concrete vehicle representing a passenger bus.
Calculable
Defines the contract for objects that support financial calculations.
Car
Concrete vehicle representing a passenger car.
Driver
Represents a driver that can be assigned to a vehicle.
DriverPanel
Panel for listing and adding drivers.
Engine
Represents the engine component of a vehicle.
Fleet
Central domain model that manages a collection of vehicles and drivers.
FleetManagementApplication
Application entry point.
FleetService
Service fa√ßade that mediates between the GUI layer and the Fleet domain model.
FuelType
Enumerates the supported fuel/energy types for vehicles.
HeavyVehicle
Abstract intermediate class for heavy vehicles (trucks, buses).
Maintainable
Defines the contract for objects that track maintenance history.
MaintenancePanel
Panel for registering maintenance records against vehicles.
MaintenanceRecord
Immutable-style record of a single maintenance event performed on a vehicle.
MaintenanceType
Enumerates the categories of vehicle maintenance.
MainWindow
Main application window (Swing JFrame).
Motorcycle
Concrete vehicle representing a motorcycle.
Reportable
Defines the contract for objects that can produce a human-readable report.
ServiceType
Enumerates the service routes for buses.
Transmission
Represents the transmission component of a vehicle.
TransmissionType
Enumerates the transmission gear-shift types.
Truck
Concrete vehicle representing a freight truck.
Vehicle
Abstract base class for every vehicle in the fleet.
VehiclePanel
Panel for listing, adding and inspecting vehicles.
